snippet: Comedy Central said that Mr. Stewart, the longtime host of the satirical news show, was giving up his post, but would remain at the helm until later this year.
abstract: Jon Stewart, longtime host of Comedy Central's The Daily Show, says he will leave after more than 16 years as anchor; as head of satirical news show, he gave program personal brand of justice, which included mockery and even indignation.
lead_paragraph: Comedy Central said that Mr. Stewart, the longtime host of the satirical news show, was giving up his post, but would remain at the helm until later this year.

headline.main: Jon Stewart Will Leave ‘The Daily Show’ on a Career High Note
